item.title: Manda add a quote by Sam Keen
item.description: "In a pluralistic culture . . . every individual must create a private mythological system. I must discover within myself the Garden of Eden from which I am exiled and the New Jeruselem toward which I am journeying. And must bear the burden of being my own redeemer, my own Christ." -- Sam Keen

item.title: Manda add a quote by Sam Keen
item.description: "Good men and good women have fire in the belly. We are fierce. Don't mess with us if you're looking for someone who will always be 'nice' to you. Nice gets you a C+ in life. We don't always smile, talk in a soft voice, or engage in indiscriminate hugs. In the loving struggle between the sexes we thrust and parry." -- Sam Keen

item.title: Manda add a quote by Sam Keen
item.description: "Chronological time is what we measure by clocks and calendars; it is always linear, orderly, quantifiable, and mechanical. Kairotic time is organic, rhythmic, bodily, leisurely, and aperiodic; it is the inner cadence that brings fruit to ripeness, a woman to childbirth, a man to change the direction of his life. " -- Sam Keen

item.title: Manda add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Communism doesn't work because people like to own stuff." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Manda add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "Tobacco is my favorite vegetable." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Manda add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "A mind is like a parachute. It doesn't work if it is not open." -- Frank Zappa
